title: Power cuts for 18th, 19th and 20th approved
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); CEB request for 4 hours & 20 minutes power cut due to unavailability of fuel for thermal power plants, approved by PUCSL for Monday (18) and for 4 hours & 50 minutes power cut on Tuesday (19) and Wednesday (20);
3 hours from 9am to 6pm and 1 hour & 20 minutes from 6pm to 10pm.
3 hours & 20 minutes from 8am to 6pm and 1 hour & 30 minutes from 6pm to 10:30pm.
